Articles.Content:
Okay, so..here, you try to make the longest sentence in history. So, for example..

Quote:
Person 1: I
Person 2: don't
Person 3: know

And so on.
Good luck, and I shall start:

The
 

 

 

EDIT: Run-ons are allowed. 

Edited August 15, 2016 by limeyptwo
